title: About
text:
Technology Transfer Group (TTG) is a students' initiative founded by Prof. Partha Pratim Chakroborty under the aegis of Sponsored Research & Industrial Consultancy, IIT Kharagpur, which believes in the potential of the Institute as a premier Research & Development centre. We act as a link between the industry and the academia to facilitate transfer of industry ready technologies and presenting IIT Kharagpur as a research consultant.
We provide you a one-stop portal into the research activities of the Institute and the various technical developments taking place.
In 2018 TTG in association with SRIC launched a UG Portal to foster the involvement of the UG students in research. Here is the link to the UG Portal.
• Follow us on - Facebook and Linkedin
